title: Any person who owns a dwelling unit on ownership basis in MCGM area, shall not be held eligible under this scheme
clause_text: Any person who owns a dwelling unit on ownership basis in MCGM area, shall not be held eligible under this scheme. Any person who can be held eligible under more than one SRS, shall be held eligible in only one scheme.
